00028 #ifndef _OPTS_UTIL_H_
00029 #define _OPTS_UTIL_H_
00030 
00036 #define _GNU_SOURCE
00037 #include <getopt.h>
00038 
00039 #include <limits.h>
00041 #define OPTS_MAX UCHAR_MAX
00042 
00043 #define OPTS_LIM (OPTS_MAX + 1)
00044 
00046 typedef int (*T_opts_action)(void *);
00047 
00052 typedef struct {
00053         int   set;              
00054         char *arg;              
00056         T_opts_action action;   
00057         void *data;             
00058         char *desc;             
00059         struct option *lopt;    
00060 } T_opts_def;
00061 
00062 /* Opts API */
00063 void opts_init(const char *progname, const char *progversion);
00064 void opts_default_opts(); 
00065 void opts_def(  char short_name, char *long_name,
00066                 char *description, char *arg_name,
00067                 T_opts_action action, void *data);
00068 int opts_getopt(int argc, char *const *argv);
00069 void opts_usage(void);
00070 
00071 /* Convenience macros */
00075 #define OPTS_DEF(short_name,long_name,description)      \
00076         opts_def(short_name,long_name,description,NULL, \
00077                 NULL,NULL)
00078 
00081 #define OPTS_DEF_ARG(short_name,long_name,description,arg_name) \
00082         opts_def(short_name,long_name,description,arg_name,     \
00083                 NULL,NULL)
00084 
00085 #define OPTS_DEF_STRTOL(short_name,long_name,description,arg_name,v)    \
00086         opts_def(short_name,long_name,description,arg_name,             \
00087                 opts_action_strtol,(void *)&(v))
00088 
00089 #define OPTS_DEF_CLEAR(short_name,long_name,description,v)      \
00090         opts_def(short_name,long_name,description,NULL,         \
00091                 opts_action_clear,(void *)&(v))
00092 
00093 #define OPTS_DEF_INCR(short_name,long_name,description,v)       \
00094         opts_def(short_name,long_name,description,NULL,         \
00095                 opts_action_incr,(void *)&(v))
00096 
00097 #define OPTS_DEF_SET(short_name,long_name,description,v)        \
00098         opts_def(short_name,long_name,description,NULL,         \
00099                 opts_action_set,(void *)&(v))
00100 
00101 /* Standard actions */
00102 int opts_action_clear(void *ptr_to_long);
00103 int opts_action_incr(void *ptr_to_long);
00104 int opts_action_set(void *ptr_to_long);
00105 int opts_action_strtol(void *ptr_to_long);
00106 int opts_action_usage(void *ignored);
00107 int opts_action_version(void *ignored);
00108 /* end opts_util.h */
